str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
From optanomai; properly, sight, i.e. the visage, an external show.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
